title: Looking for Plat mid laner to climb to diamond
body:
After you read this post, add EL Boosto or Precise. 

Welcome to the family.  The 0 salt maximum sugar team is back baby.

We are looking for a solid mid-laner, someone who knows their shit. Though we do not expect you to win lane every game, we expect you to be able to play a few champions (with decent KDA, 3~4+) + have a few sneaky pocket picks ready. 

- THE ONLY RANK WE WILL ACCEPT ARE FROM PLAT 5 TO PLAT 1!!
- We are strictly a CASUAL team, be on at anytime, start and stop whenever you want. We prefer having someone playing everyday but hopefully we get a few people.
- We use Discord for voice chat but can also work with skype.
- Legit serious about that 0 salt thing though and expect it from us because we expect it from you!

We have a solid Top, jungle, support and ADC. We don't always play 5's because not everyone is on at the same time {{item:3070}} 

We are a group of people just looking to have fun and climb together.

So what are you waiting for? JOIN THE FAM~

replies.body: I am bad at games, let me join :^)
